Member Function Documentation

◆ GetChannel()

discpp::Channel discpp::Cache::GetChannel ( const discpp::Snowflake &  id,
bool  can_request = false 
)

Gets a channel from guild cache and private caches.

If you set can_request to true, and the channel is not found in cache, then we will request the channel from the REST API. But if its not true, and its not found, an exception will be thrown of DiscordObjectNotFound.

If the id is of a DM channel's id, it will return that DM channel.

Returns
discpp::Channel

◆ GetDiscordMessage()

discpp::Message discpp::Cache::GetDiscordMessage ( const Snowflake &  channel_id,
const Snowflake &  id,
bool  can_request = false 
)

Get a member with id.

If you set can_request to true, and the message is not found in cache, then we will request the message from the REST API. But if its not true, and its not found, an exception will be thrown of DiscordObjectNotFound.

Parameters
[in]channel_idThe channel_id of the message.
[in]idThe id of the message.
[in]can_requestWhether or not the library can request the message from the REST API.
Returns
discpp::Message

◆ GetDMChannel()

discpp::Channel discpp::Cache::GetDMChannel ( const discpp::Snowflake &  id,
bool  can_request = false 
)

Get a DM channel with id.

If you set can_request to true, and the dm channel is not found in cache, then we will request the dm channel from the REST API. But if its not true, and its not found, an exception will be thrown of DiscordObjectNotFound.

Returns
discpp::Channel

◆ GetGuild()

std::shared_ptr< discpp::Guild > discpp::Cache::GetGuild ( const Snowflake &  guild_id,
bool  can_request = false 
)

Gets a discpp::Guild from a guild id.

If you set can_request to true, and the guild is not found in cache, then we will request the guild from the REST API. But if its not true, and its not found, an exception will be thrown of DiscordObjectNotFound.

Parameters
[in]guild_idThe guild id of the guild you want to get.
[in]can_requestDetermines if we can request the guild from REST API if its not found in cache.
Returns
std::shared_ptr<discpp::Guild>

const discpp::Snowflake &  id,
bool  can_request = false 
)

Get a member with id.

If you set can_request to true, and the member is not found in cache, then we will request the member from the REST API. But if its not true, and its not found, an exception will be thrown of DiscordObjectNotFound.

Returns
discpp::Member
